original_text: Ram became the father of Amminadab. Amminadab became the father of Nahshon. Nahshon was the leader of Judah's tribe.
korean_text: 람은 암미나답을 낳고 암미나답은 나손을 낳았으니 나손은 유다 자손의 방백이며

sentences.original_text: Ram became the father of Amminadab.
Amminadab became the father of Nahshon.
Nahshon was the leader of Judah's tribe.
